amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount appropriated to the Center for Tobacco Products by $392 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount appropriated to the Center for Tobacco Products by $392 million dollars and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 436).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 257 (Roll no. 436).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Stearns.
